caption.body: With actual face-to-face interaction limited by this public health crisis, many of us are missing that human connectivity that is so crucial to our happiness. Although our Video Arts gallery is currently closed, we’re featuring online the work of four artists to share stories of meaningful connections—a shy teen’s victory over self-consciousness in his search for acceptance; the resilience of human connection in the face of memory loss; the courage of a young boy to reach out to the object of his affection; and a reminder from the heart of New York’s Greenwich Village that community is often found in unlikely places.  Give yourself a few minutes and watch the videos here: http://bit.ly/VideoArts
caption.excerpt: With actual face-to-face interaction limited by this public health crisis, many of us are missing that human connectivity that is so crucial to our happiness.
